sources.title: White Mountains Insurance Group, Ltd. - Fitch Ratings
sources.snippet: White Mountains Insurance Group, Ltd. (WTM) sold OneBeacon Insurance Group, Ltd. in late September 2017, eliminating all significant insurance operations at WTM. Fitch Ratings believes WTM will ultimately redeploy its capital back into an insurance entity. During this transitional period, WTM is being reviewed under bespoke criteria.
